title: Homemade Pizza
instructions: 1. Prepare pizza dough. 2. Add sauce, cheese, and desired toppings. 3. Bake in the oven until crust is golden.
ingredients: Pizza dough, Tomato sauce, Mozzarella cheese, Pepperoni, Bell peppers, Onions, Mushrooms

title: Taco Salad
instructions: 1. Cook ground beef with taco seasoning. 2. Assemble lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, beans, and cooked beef. 3. Top with salsa and sour cream.
ingredients: Lettuce, Tomatoes, Cheddar cheese, Black beans, Ground beef, Taco seasoning, Salsa, Sour cream

title: Creamy Mushroom Risotto
instructions: 1. Sauté onions and mushrooms. 2. Add rice and stir. 3. Gradually add broth while stirring until rice is creamy and cooked.
ingredients: Arborio rice, Mushrooms, Onion, Chicken broth, Parmesan cheese, Butter, White wine

title: Fresh Fruit Salad
instructions: 1. Chop assorted fruits. 2. Combine in a bowl. 3. Optional: add honey or lime juice for extra flavor.
ingredients: Assorted fruits (strawberries, kiwi, pineapple, grapes, mango), Honey (optional), Lime juice (optional)

title: Beef and Broccoli Stir-Fry
instructions: 1. Marinate beef in soy sauce and garlic. 2. Sauté beef until browned. 3. Add broccoli and stir-fry until tender.
ingredients: Beef sirloin, Broccoli, Soy sauce, Garlic, Oil, Cornstarch, Rice vinegar
